attributes.action: make it mandatory that when UK citizens are speaking on the phone, they must speak in the manner of Scott Devlin (wellllll, yeeeeeessss!)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Scott Devlin speaks too posh. We must as a nation, rise and bring our quality of language up to the standard of the Oatlands boy.Whisky, Alpha, November, Kilo, Echo, Romeo.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
